text: The Honey Bee is a 1920 American silent drama film directed by Rupert Julian and starring Marguerita Sylva, Thomas Holding and Nigel Barrie.Goble p.323 ==Cast== * Marguerita Sylva as Hilda Wilson * Thomas Holding as Harris Doreyn * Nigel Barrie as Blink Moran * Albert Ray as Will Harper * George Hernandez as Ed Johnson * Harvey Clark as Dr. Jules Garceau * Dell Boone as Mrs. Harris Doreyn * Ethel Ullman as Adele Rainey * Charlotte Merriam as Blondie * Ruth Maurice as Juliette * Harry Tenbrook as Apache * Norman Selby as Carpentier ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:1920 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Rupert Julian Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Honey Bee
